title: Unknown Direct X error on game start after 7.15 update.
body:
"Please make sure my video drivers are up to date."

Yeah, pretty sure they are. And unknown error means I can't fix it.

Anybody have an idea of what to do here?

replies.body:
This can be fixed with some troubleshooting!  Run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure your drivers are indeed up to date.  Keep in mind, though, that this error can be the result of other factors too.  For example, if your OS or anti-virus settings recently updating, it could be blocking your game files from being accessed and result in this error.

You should also run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that the game is able to render, use your drivers without issue, and install updates where needed.  I hope that helps!
